thread.title: Father told daughter to run as man tried to kidnap her | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Father told daughter to run as man tried to kidnap her | Daily Mail Online

author: Scott Campbell For Mailonline
title: Father told daughter to run as man tried to kidnap her | Daily Mail Online
text: Horrified father heard his daughter, 11, being beaten up and abducted when he rang her mobile phone seconds before a drunk snatched her as she walked home from school Mawande Sicwebu grabbed the girl telling her 'come with me or I'll kill you' He dragged her away and subjected her to 40 minute ordeal in Colchester, Essex But the girl's father contacted her by chance and screamed: 'Run for your life' Victim was saved by the 'lucky' call, prosecutors told Ipswich Crown Court Sicwebu was jailed for two years and eight months after admitting the abduction
